result.reason: The UI incorrectly displays credential information on the connection tab when 'connect without credentials' is selected, which is misleading.
result.approach: Investigate tab title rendering logic in the main form or connection tab control; ensure it checks the 'connect without credentials' flag and omits or corrects the displayed username.
